title: Oathbreaker
content:
pells available only to Oathbreaker.

If you want to restore your old Oath, speak to the Oathbreaker Knight in your Camp. He will offer to restore your Oath for a fee of 1000gp. (This price will increase if you break your Oath again. )

How to Break Your Oath

Oath of the Crown

Caught for crime activities. (Stealing or Killing NPCs, etc.) Break your promises to others. Act 1 Help Sazza escape or kill her in dialogue. Promise to help tieflings and betray them. Betraying Minthara after you agreed
